title: what if vaynes W scaled off of ap?
body:
nerf the base and add in a ap ratio to make deathcap (hypocrite of how she hates magic lol) vayne possible.

memers and tanks are happy everyone wins.

replies.body: At least this way she can build Rageblade and not feel COMPLETELY awful.
how is it completely awful? because you waste 25 AP? I guess doing 14% of the targets max HP in true damage every 2 autos inst worth it.
